name: 2.4.0.Final
body:
- [**area/storage**] [new-system-tests] Deploy test of Apicurio Registry with PostgreSQL storage without IAM [#2958](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2958)
- [**area/storage**] [new-system-tests] Deploy test of Apicurio Registry with PostgreSQL storage and Keycloak [#2957](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2957)
- [**Enhancement**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rules**] Use plugins to support additional schema types in Apicurio Registry [#2943](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2943)
- [**Question**] How to use the vertx http client [#2910](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2910)
- [**area/storage**] Kafka JDBC Sink Connector with Apicurio registry [#2896](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2896)
- [**area/rest-api**] When using apicurio with mongodb-kafka-connector, I get RESTEASY003210 error  [#2889](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2889)
- [**Bug**][**area/ui**][**area/compatibility**] JSON backward compatibility check for adding non-required fields [#2882](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2882)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] Derefence parameter not working [#2863](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2863)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**] Confluent Compatibility Issue with references  [#2852](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2852)
- [**area/ccompat-api**][**state/PR-created**] Confluent Compatibility Issue with subject version [#2851](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2851)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/compatibility**] Json backward compatability bug with type-keyword from string to array in properties [#2835](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2835)
- [**priority/high**][**area/ui**][**area/auth**] UI fails when RBAC is on  (500 / e.method is undefined) [#2805](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2805)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/ui**] redhat amqstream registry frontend : no refresh cache without ctrl + F5 [#2793](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2793)
- [**component/registry**][**area/rest-api**][**area/rest-client**] Add groups operations to the rest api [#2774](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2774)
- [**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/storage**] Investigate running PG and Registry native within the same image [#2744](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2744)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/storage**] Create a native version of the "-mem" variant [#2735](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2735)
- [**Question**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/serdes**] Complex JSON Schema Validation Fail [#2552](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2552)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Global-id value is 65034875748 [#2547](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2547)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Canonical schemas in ccompat/v6 API [#2279](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2279)
- [**Discussion**][**component/registry**] Custom Authorization Roles [#2252](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2252)
- [**Bug**] UI is trying to use keycloak as openid provider inspite of configuration to not do that [#1801](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1801)
- [**Task**] Test application with different OIDC providers [#1781](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1781)
- [**closed**] Using ccompat creates base64 encoded protobuf schemas ? [#1478](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1478)
- [**closed**] Create a utility to migrate data from confluent schema registry to apicurio registry [#172](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/172)
